name: SereniTee
description:
SereniTee is a work in progress, solo developed mini golf game, boasting random hole generation across (soon to be) a plethora of varying environments and aesthetics. Fancy golfing on Mars? I got you. How about floating in the clouds, soaking in the breeze alongside traditional Japanese pagodas and an army of cherry blossoms? I go... actually that one's still in progress, but I assume you're picking up what I'm throwing down here.

Hoping to kickstart my gamedev portfolio with the skills and experience this project has and is providing me on a daily basis. Thanks for checking me the page out.

Full Disclosure: The WebGL port is currently, with the greatest understatement in the world, rough around the edges; chances are it'll crash eventually if you're generating a lot of holes. However, it should give a decent idea and demonstration of how the game plays out before then. I'll be working to try and stabilise the build in the near future.
